test_cases.title: Create Standard PO with All Mandatory Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that a procurement user can create a standard PO with all mandatory fields filled.
preconditions: Vendor and material master dATF exist
test_steps: Enter vendor, material, quantity, price, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created successfully; no FI document is posted.

test_cases.title: Attempt PO Creation with Missing Mandatory Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that PO cannot be saved if mandatory fields are missing.
test_steps: Leave one or more mandatory fields blank
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents PO creation.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Invalid DATF Types
test_cases.description: Verify system validation when entering invalid dATF types (e.g., text in quantity field).
test_cases.expected_results: System displays validation error and prevents PO creation.

test_cases.title: PO Creation with Maximum Field Lengths
test_cases.description: Verify PO creation when mandatory fields are filled to their maximum allowed length.
test_steps: Enter maximum allowed characters for vendor and material fields
Enter valid quantity, price, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created successfully; dATF is saved correctly.

test_cases.title: Verify No FI Document Posted at PO Creation
test_cases.description: Ensure that no FI document is posted when a PO is created.
test_steps: Create a PO with all mandatory fields
Check FI document postings for the PO
test_cases.expected_results: No FI document is posted for the PO creation.

test_cases.title: PO Routed for Approval Based on Release Strategy
test_cases.description: Verify that PO is routed for approval according to defined release strategy.
test_cases.expected_results: PO is routed to appropriate approver(s) based on release strategy.

test_cases.title: Approve PO with Correct Role
test_cases.description: Verify that only users with approval role can approve POs.
test_cases.expected_results: PO status updates to 'Approved'.

test_cases.title: Reject PO with Correct Role
test_cases.description: Verify that only users with approval role can reject POs.
test_cases.expected_results: PO status updates to 'Rejected'.

test_cases.title: Attempt Approval by Unauthorized User
test_cases.description: Verify that users without approval role cannot approve or reject POs.
preconditions: User does not have approval role
test_steps: Attempt to approve or reject the PO
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents approval/rejection and displays error.

test_cases.title: Prevent Processing of Unapproved PO
test_cases.description: Verify that unapproved POs cannot be used for GR or IR processing.
preconditions: PO is created but not approved
test_steps: Login as warehouse or AP user
Attempt to post GR or IR against unapproved PO
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents further processing and displays error.

test_cases.title: Post Full Goods Receipt Against Approved PO
test_cases.description: Verify posting of full GR against an approved PO.
test_steps: Select PO and enter full quantity
test_cases.expected_results: GR is posted; inventory/expense updated; FI document generated; GR/IR credited.

test_cases.title: Post Partial Goods Receipt Against Approved PO
test_cases.description: Verify posting of partial GR against an approved PO.
test_steps: Select PO and enter partial quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Partial GR is posted; inventory/expense updated; FI document generated; GR/IR credited.

test_cases.title: Attempt GR Posting with Quantity Exceeding PO
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents GR posting with quantity greater than PO quantity.
test_steps: Select PO and enter quantity greater than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents over-receipt.

test_cases.title: Multiple Partial GRs Until PO Fully Received
test_cases.description: Verify system allows multiple partial GRs until PO is fully received.
test_steps: Continue until total GR quantity equals PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System allows multiple GRs; open PO quantity updates; prevents further GR after full receipt.

test_cases.title: GR Posting Updates Inventory/Expense and FI Document
test_cases.description: Verify that GR posting updates inventory/expense and generates FI document.
test_cases.expected_results: Inventory/expense updated; FI document generated; GR/IR credited.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice with 3-Way Matching
test_cases.description: Verify posting of vendor invoice with 3-way matching (PO, GR, Invoice).
test_steps: Select PO and enter invoice details matching PO and GR
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted; FI document generated; 3-way match successful.

test_cases.title: Post Invoice with Price Difference Within Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify invoice posting when price difference is within tolerance.
test_steps: Post invoice with price slightly different from PO but within tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted; FI document generated; invoice cleared for payment.

test_cases.title: Post Invoice with Quantity Difference Exceeding Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify invoice is blocked for payment when quantity difference exceeds tolerance.
test_steps: Post invoice with quantity exceeding GR and PO tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment; flagged for review; FI document generated.

test_cases.title: Post Invoice with Price Difference Exceeding Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify invoice is blocked for payment when price difference exceeds tolerance.
test_steps: Post invoice with price exceeding PO tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment; flagged for review; FI document generated.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting Automatically Creates FI Document
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice posting automatically creates FI document.
test_cases.expected_results: FI document is generated for the invoice posting.

test_cases.title: Automatic GR/IR Account Clearing on Invoice Posting
test_cases.description: Verify that GR/IR account is automatically cleared when invoice is posted.
test_steps: Post invoice against PO with matching GR
test_cases.expected_results: GR/IR account is cleared; clearing entries visible in FI reports.

test_cases.title: Check No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close
test_cases.description: Verify that no open GR/IR balances remain at period close beyond defined tolerances.
test_steps: Run GR/IR reconciliation report at period close
test_cases.expected_results: No open GR/IR balances remain beyond tolerance limits.

test_cases.title: Invoice Posting Creates Liability in Vendor Account
test_cases.description: Verify that invoice posting creates liability entry in vendor account.
test_cases.expected_results: Liability entry is created; vendor balance updated.

test_cases.title: Vendor Account Postings Visible in FI Reports
test_cases.description: Verify that vendor account postings are visible in FI reports.
test_cases.expected_results: Vendor account postings for invoices are visible in FI reports.

test_cases.title: View PO History Including All Activities
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view PO history including creation, approval, GR, and invoice postings.
preconditions: PO has been created, approved, GR and invoice posted
test_cases.expected_results: PO history displays all changes and actions.

test_cases.title: PO History Access Restricted to Authorized Users
test_cases.description: Verify that only authorized users can view PO history.
preconditions: User does not have access role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents access and displays error.

test_cases.title: View GR and Invoice Status for a PO
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view GR and invoice status for a PO.
preconditions: PO has GR and invoice posted
test_steps: Login as procurement or finance user
test_cases.expected_results: Status displays posted quantity, date, user, and blocked invoices.

test_cases.title: Blocked Invoice Status Clearly Indicated
test_cases.description: Verify that blocked invoices are clearly indicated in status view.
test_steps: Login as procurement or finance user
test_cases.expected_results: Blocked invoices are clearly marked and flagged for review.

test_cases.title: View GR/IR Balances by PO and Vendor
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view open and cleared GR/IR balances by PO and vendor.
test_steps: View balances by PO and vendor
test_cases.expected_results: Open and cleared GR/IR balances are displayed in real time.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Balance Report Access Restricted
test_cases.description: Verify that only users with appropriate roles can access GR/IR balance reports.
preconditions: User does not have finance role
test_steps: Attempt to access GR/IR balance report
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents access and displays error.

test_cases.title: Enforce Role-Based Access for PO Creation
test_cases.description: Verify that only users with procurement role can create POs.
preconditions: User does not have procurement role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents PO creation and displays error.

test_cases.title: Enforce Role-Based Access for FI Reports
test_cases.description: Verify that only finance users can access FI reports.
preconditions: User does not have finance role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents access and displays error.

test_cases.title: Role Assignment is Auditable
test_cases.description: Verify that role assignments are logged and auditable.
preconditions: User is assigned a new role
test_steps: Assign procurement or finance role to user
test_cases.expected_results: Role assignment is logged and visible in audit trail.

test_cases.title: Prevent Procurement Users from Posting FI Documents
test_cases.description: Verify that procurement users cannot post FI documents.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents posting and displays error.

test_cases.title: Prevent Accounting Users from Creating/Approving POs
test_cases.description: Verify that accounting users cannot create or approve POs.
test_steps: Attempt to create or approve PO
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents action and displays error.

test_cases.title: Prevent Assignment of Conflicting Roles
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents assignment of conflicting procurement and accounting roles to a single user.
test_steps: Attempt to assign accounting role to user with procurement role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents assignment and displays error.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties is Documented and Auditable
test_cases.description: Verify that segregation of duties is documented and auditable.
test_steps: Check audit logs for role assignments and changes
Review documentation of segregation of duties
test_cases.expected_results: Segregation of duties is documented and visible in audit trail.

test_cases.title: System Blocks Invoice with Price Difference Exceeding Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify that system blocks invoice for payment when price difference exceeds tolerance.
test_steps: Post invoice with price difference exceeding tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked; payment processing prevented; user notified.

test_cases.title: System Notifies User When Invoice is Blocked
test_cases.description: Verify that system notifies user when invoice is blocked for payment.
test_cases.expected_results: User receives notification of blocked invoice.

test_cases.title: Configure Tolerance Limits by User Role
test_cases.description: Verify that tolerance limits for invoice matching can be configured by user role.
test_steps: Configure tolerance limits for AP and finance roles
test_cases.expected_results: Tolerance limits are saved and applied by user role.

test_cases.title: Invoices Within Tolerance Posted Without Blocking
test_cases.description: Verify that invoices within tolerance are posted without blocking.
test_steps: Post invoice with price/quantity difference within tolerance
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is posted and cleared for payment.

test_cases.title: Tolerance Breaches Logged for Audit
test_cases.description: Verify that tolerance breaches during invoice matching are logged for audit purposes.
test_cases.expected_results: Tolerance breach is logged and visible in audit trail.

test_cases.title: FI Document Uses Correct GL Accounts and Posting Keys
test_cases.description: Verify that FI documents use correct GL accounts and posting keys for P2P transactions.
test_steps: Review FI document for PO, GR, and invoice
Check GL accounts and posting keys
test_cases.expected_results: FI document uses correct GL accounts and posting keys.

test_cases.title: System Validates FI Posting Against Accounting Rules
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates FI postings against accounting rules before posting.
test_steps: Attempt to post FI document with incorrect GL account
test_cases.expected_results: System rejects non-compliant posting and displays error.

test_cases.title: Create Vendor Master Record with All Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that user can create vendor master record with all required fields.
preconditions: User has master dATF specialist role
test_steps: Navigate to vendor master creation screen
test_cases.expected_results: Vendor master record is created successfully.

test_cases.title: Prevent Duplicate Vendor Master DATF Entry
test_cases.description: Verify that system prevents creation of duplicate vendor master records.
test_steps: Attempt to create vendor master with same details
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents duplicate entry and displays error.

test_cases.title: Create Material Master Record with All Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that user can create material master record with all required fields.
preconditions: User has master dATF specialist role
test_steps: Navigate to material master creation screen
test_cases.expected_results: Material master record is created successfully.

test_cases.title: Master DATF Creation is Logged and Auditable
test_cases.description: Verify that master dATF creation is logged and auditable.
preconditions: Vendor or material master record created
test_cases.expected_results: Master dATF creation is logged and visible in audit trail.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact in Real Time
test_cases.description: Verify that system updates procurement and FI records immediately after each transaction.
test_steps: View PO status and financial impact
test_cases.expected_results: Procurement and FI records are updated in real time; reports reflect laTest Data.

test_cases.title: No Manual Intervention Required for Updates
test_cases.description: Verify that no manual intervention is required for procurement and FI record updates.
test_cases.expected_results: Records are updated automatically; no manual update options available.

test_cases.title: Invoices Available for Payment in FI-AP
test_cases.description: Verify that invoices posted in P2P are available for payment in FI-AP.
preconditions: Invoice posted and cleared for payment
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is available for payment selection in FI-AP.

test_cases.title: Blocked Invoices Not Available for Payment Selection
test_cases.description: Verify that blocked invoices are not available for payment selection in FI-AP.
test_cases.expected_results: Blocked invoice is not available for payment selection.

test_cases.title: Payment Run Uses Standard SAP FI-AP Processes
test_cases.description: Verify that payment runs use standard SAP S/4HANA FI-AP processes.
test_cases.expected_results: Payments are processed using standard SAP FI-AP functionality.

test_cases.title: Payment Status Updated in Vendor Accounts
test_cases.description: Verify that payment status is updated in vendor accounts after payment run.
test_cases.expected_results: Payment status is updated in vendor accounts.

summary: 54 comprehensive test cases have been generated covering all user stories and requirements for the SAP S/4HANA P2P process, including positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for PO creation, approval, GR/IR processing, FI integration, reporting, controls, master dATF, and compliance.
